definition: meritorious deed/benevolent act
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
to cooperate in a charity project

sentences.english: Australian Liberal Democratic Party's President Huang Zhaoqiang met and praised Zhao for his philanthropic undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲自民黨主席黃肇強都接見並表揚了趙尚陽的善舉。

sentences.english: At what point does a noble deed turn into fanaticism ?
sentences.chinese: 告訴我，是怎麼從做一樁善舉，走上不歸路的？

sentences.english: Benevolence can never be measured in money.
sentences.chinese: 善舉絕不應該用金錢衡量。

sentences.english: Her relief efforts during theYuuzhan Vong crisis are well known.
sentences.chinese: 在遇戰瘋人危機期間，她救濟難民的善舉廣爲人知。

sentences.english: Praise the everyday as well as the exceptional.
sentences.chinese: 表揚特別的貢獻，也要褒獎點滴的善舉。

sentences.english: Finally, the autobiography is in itself a profound act of compassion.
sentences.chinese: 最後，這本自傳本身就是意義深遠的善舉。
大熊家族對人類的善舉也有了迴應。

sentences.english: Have you ever done (or received) a non-random act of kindness that made you very happy?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有做出過某個不隨意的善舉讓你十分快樂？

sentences.english: Virtue benevolence is the only undefeated investment.
sentences.chinese: 德行善舉是惟一不敗的投資。

sentences.english: Other acts of kindness include cash donations and charity.
sentences.chinese: 其他善舉還包括捐助現款及慈善義捐。

sentences.english: Help to make earth happy, like the heaven above.
sentences.chinese: 小小的善舉，細微的愛語，使地球快樂，不亞於天堂。

sentences.english: Guo says his "Good Samaritan" approach to life reflects the attitude of most Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 郭說他在生活中的善舉反映了大部分中國人的態度。

sentences.english: At what point does a noble deed turn into fanaticism?
sentences.chinese: 告訴我，是怎麼從做一樁善舉，走上不歸路的？

sentences.english: Tell me something. At what point does a noble deed turn into fanaticism?
sentences.chinese: 告訴我，是怎麼從做一樁善舉，走上不歸路的？

sentences.english: I think this is something we can never forget, forever.
sentences.chinese: 我們將永遠不會忘記這些善舉。

sentences.english: One good deed is not enough to redeem a man of a lifetime of wickedness.
sentences.chinese: 一件善舉並不能補償一個人作歹一世犯下的惡行。

definition: to practice what one preaches (idiom)
service to the public/public welfare undertaking/charity/social facility
charity event/public service activities
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to hope/to expect/expectation(s)
to show concern and care for
zeal/enthusiasm/ardor/enthusiastic/warmhearted
lit. throw out a brick and get jade thrown back (idiom)/fig. to attract others' interest or suggestions by putting forward one's own modest ideas to get the ball rolling
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
enthusiasm/zeal/zealous/zest/enthusiastic/ardent/warmhearted
to encourage
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
not to be shirked without dishonor (idiom)/incumbent/bounden (duty)
fundraising
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
